item.title: Altice 债务闹剧为欧洲带来美国式债权人合作
item.description: 法国 Altice 公司即将进行的债务谈判可能会使美国重组市场的另一个出口冲击欧洲。【原文：Altice France’s upcoming debt negotiations could see another export of the US restructuring market hitting Europe.】

item.title: PNC 净利息收入低于预期，贷款增长乏力
item.description: PNC Financial Services Group Inc. 第一季度净利息收入不及预期，这表明这家总部位于匹兹堡的贷款公司仍在为贷款增长乏力而苦苦挣扎。【原文：PNC Financial Services Group Inc. missed estimates for net interest income in the first quarter, a sign that the Pittsburgh-based lender has continued to struggle with muted loan growth.】

item.title: 肯尼亚政府计划合并金融监管机构
item.description: 肯尼亚总理内阁秘书穆萨利亚-穆达瓦迪（Musalia Mudavadi）表示，肯尼亚重新启动了合并三个金融业监管机构职能的计划，以消除重叠和重复。【原文：Kenya revived plans to merge the functions of three financial industry regulatory bodies to remove overlaps and duplication, Prime Cabinet Secretary Musalia Mudavadi said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。受利率担忧、中东紧张局势和喜忧参半的中国数据影响，股市大跌。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. A stocks selloff rumbles through markets on interest-rate fears, Middle East tensions and mixed Chinese data. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 英国央行伦巴第利称降息是 "前进的方向
item.description: 2024 年 2 月 16 日星期五，美国华盛顿，经济合作与发展组织（OECD）首席经济学家克莱尔-隆巴代利（Clare Lombardelli）在全美商业经济协会（NABE）经济政策会议上。今年年会的主题是 "驾驭地缘政治动荡和国内不确定性"。摄影师：格雷姆-斯隆/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Clare Lombardelli, chief economist at the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD), during the National Association of Business Economics (NABE) economic policy conference in Washington, DC, US, on Friday, Feb. 16, 2024. The theme of this year's annual meeting is "Navigating Geopolitical Turbulence and Domestic Uncertainty." Photographer: Graeme Sloan/Bloomberg】

item.title: 富豪涌入棕榈岛，迪拜豪宅销售飙升
item.description: 第一季度，迪拜标价 1000 万美元或以上的住宅销售额攀升了 19%，尽管整个地区的地缘政治局势日益紧张，但全球超级富豪仍继续涌向中东的商业和旅游中心。【原文：Sales of homes with a price tag of $10 million or more climbed 19% in Dubai during the first quarter as the world’s ultra-wealthy continue to flock to the Middle East’s business and tourism hub despite mounting geopolitical tension across the region.】

item.title: 道富坚持美联储将于 6 月降息的逆向预测
item.description: 尽管一连串火热的经济数据刺激大多数交易员将降息押注推后到今年晚些时候，但道富环球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）仍坚持逆势呼吁美联储最快在 6 月份降息。【原文：State Street Global Advisors is standing by a contrarian call for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rate as soon as June despite a string of hot economic data that has spurred most traders to push back bets to later in the year.】

item.title: 可可稀缺扭曲了研磨数据作为需求指南的作用
item.description: 随着可可危机的加深，长期以来用来衡量巧克力消费量的磨粉量数字已不再是一个可靠的需求指标。【原文：As the cocoa crisis deepens, grindings figures that have long been used to gauge chocolate consumption are becoming a less reliable indicator of demand.】

item.title: 碧桂园寻求再次延长部分陆上债券的期限
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. is pushing back some onshore bond payments to later dates despite a round of extensions last year, according to people familiar with the matter, underscoring the financial stress at the Chinese property developer.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司将于本周发布最新业务计划
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Plc）董事会成员将于本周举行最后的会谈，以更新其业务计划，因为股东们认为该公司之前的计划 "毫无可取之处"。【原文：Thames Water Plc board members are set for last-ditch talks to update their business plan this week after shareholders branded its previous one “uninvestible.”】

item.title: 尽管受到黑客攻击影响，UnitedHealth 仍实现超预期利润
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. reported first-quarter profit that beat Wall Street’s expectations and affirmed its outlook for the year, despite the costs associated with a cyberattack on one of its subsidiaries that has roiled the health-care industry.】

item.title: 价值 100 亿美元的矿山如何成为能源转型的警示故事
item.description:
第一量子矿业公司在巴拿马丛林深处建造了一个巨大的铜矿项目。然后，一切都土崩瓦解了。【原文：

First Quantum Minerals built a giant copper project deep in the Panamanian jungle. Then it all fell apart.

】

item.title: 押注美联储推迟减息，美元创年内最佳表现
item.description: 由于越来越多的人预期美国利率将在更长时间内保持高位，促使投资者纷纷涌入美元，美元将迎来一年多来的最佳涨势。【原文：The dollar is headed for its best rally in over a year as growing expectations that US interest rates will stay high for longer prompt investors to pile into the currency.】

item.title: 美元为何引发新兴市场混乱？
item.description: 今年以来，随着美元的不断走强，新兴市场货币纷纷下跌。台湾货币本周跌至近八年来的最低水平，印度卢比跌至创纪录水平，马来西亚林吉特接近1998年亚洲金融危机以来的最弱水平。在彭博社追踪的 23 种主要发展中国家货币中，除一种货币外，今年所有货币对美元的汇率都下跌了。【原文：Emerging-market currencies have tumbled this year as the dollar has gone from strength to strength. Taiwan’s currency dropped to the lowest level in almost eight years this week, India’s rupee slumped to a record, and Malaysia’s ringgit is close to the weakest since the Asian financial crisis in 1998. All except one of the 23 main developing-nation currencies tracked by Bloomberg have fallen against the greenback this year.】

item.title: 中美为何争夺太平洋岛国的影响力？
item.description: 中国和美国在南太平洋的竞争日趋白热化，双方都在寻求在岛国中建立影响力，而这些岛国自二战以来从未受到过超级大国的关注。2022 年，所罗门群岛与北京签署了一项安全协议，这在该地区尚属首次，从而使美国的盟国澳大利亚和新西兰担心中国可能在该地区建立军事基地。这引发了一系列地区外交活动和援助承诺。【原文：Competition is heating up between China and the US in the southern Pacific, with each seeking to build influence among island nations that haven’t received much superpower attention since World War II. The stakes rose in 2022 when the Solomon Islands signed a security accord with Beijing — a first for the region — raising fears in Australia and New Zealand, both US allies, about a possible Chinese military base in the neighborhood. That prompted a flurry of regional diplomacy and pledges of aid】

item.title: 新西兰航空公司董事长表示正与波音公司开展 "建设性 "合作
item.description: 新西兰航空公司（Air New Zealand Ltd.）将与波音公司 "建设性地合作"，以确保其787梦想飞机的安全，并相信这家美国飞机制造商能够兑现其订单，即使它面临着对其生产实践的更严格审查。【原文：Air New Zealand Ltd. will “work constructively” with Boeing Co. to secure its 787 Dreamliners and has faith the US planemaker can deliver on its order even as it faces increased scrutiny into its manufacturing practices.】

item.title: 摩根大通分析师称对欧洲银行的谨慎判断是错误的
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co）分析师表示，他们对欧洲银行股持谨慎态度是错误的，欧洲银行股是该地区今年表现最好的行业之一。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co analysts said they were wrong to be cautious on European bank stocks, one of the region’s top performing sectors this year.】

item.description:
截至4月14日的一周内，日出口量增至395万桶

。【原文：

item.title: 德国投资者信心回升，表明经济即将复苏
Makhlouf 称，如果通胀趋势持续，欧洲央行可能在 6 月降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）告诉《爱尔兰每日邮报》，如果通胀趋势持续下去，欧洲央行应该能够在下次会议上降息。【原文：The European Central Bank should be able to cut interest rates at its next meeting if the trend in inflation persists, Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf told the Irish Daily Mail.】

item.title: 韩元触及 1 美元兑 1400 韩元后韩国发出罕见警告
item.description: 在韩元兑美元汇率自 2022 年底以来首次短暂触及 1400 点大关后，韩国当局罕见地向外汇市场参与者发出了警告。【原文：South Korean authorities issued a rare warning to participants in the foreign exchange market after the Korean won briefly hit the 1,400 mark against the dollar for the first time since late 2022.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 McCarthy 认为澳大利亚税收抑制了住房投资
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 很想在澳大利亚的住房市场多做些事情，但高税收等因素阻碍了这家投资巨头的步伐。【原文：Blackstone Inc. would love to do more in Australia’s housing market, but factors like high taxes are holding the investment giant back.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产在增长和利率风险中跌至 2024 年低点
item.description: 新兴市场股票基准指数抹去了 2024 年的升幅，货币指数则创下年内新低，因为有迹象表明全球货币宽松政策将推迟，中国经济复苏依然疲弱。【原文：The benchmark index for emerging-market equities erased its 2024 advance and the gauge for currencies posted a new low for the year amid signals global monetary easing will be delayed and China’s economic recovery remains weak.】

item.title: 德意志银行和摩根士丹利认为欧洲央行今年仅有三次降息
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）都下调了对欧洲央行借贷成本的预测，预计今年只会有三次变动。【原文：Deutsche Bank and Morgan Stanley both trimmed their forecasts for European Central Bank borrowing costs, predicting now only three moves this year.】

item.title: 印度信实公司试图出售美国石油，因为俄罗斯石油流量正在回升
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）上周向亚洲其他买家提供了美国石油，这令市场感到意外，因为炼油商在购买原油后几周内就试图转售原油的做法并不常见。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. offered US oil to other buyers in Asia last week, surprising the market as it’s unusual for refiners to try and resell crude within weeks of buying it.】

item.title: 交易低迷，汇丰裁减十余名亚洲投资银行家
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在整个亚洲地区交易低迷的情况下，汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）已开始对其亚洲投资银行进行新一轮裁员。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has started a new round of job cuts at its Asia investment bank amid a slump in dealmaking across the region, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国开发商将香港豪华公寓项目价格下调 40
item.description: 在债务偿还压力不断增大、香港房地产市场竞争日益加剧的情况下，陷入困境的中国开发商开始降价近一半，试图出售香港一个新综合体的豪华公寓。【原文：Distressed Chinese developers trying to sell luxury apartments at a new complex in Hong Kong have begun slashing prices by almost half amid mounting debt repayment pressure and intensifying competition in the city’s property market.】

item.title: 支付量增长放缓，慧科收入不及预期
item.description: Wise Plc 公布的第四季度营收不及分析师预期，原因是转账应用的使用量增长放缓。【原文：Wise Plc reported revenue in its fourth quarter that missed analyst estimates as growth in the usage of the money-transfer app slowed.】

item.title: 苏格兰电力公司将为多收客户费用支付 150 万英镑
item.description: 英国最大的能源供应商之一因违反客户账单价格上限而被处以 150 万英镑（约合 190 万美元）的罚款。【原文：One of Britain’s largest energy suppliers was slapped with a £1.5 million ($1.9 million) penalty after breaching a price cap on customer bills.】

item.title: 欧洲央行雷恩称地缘政治是降息的最大风险所在
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，通胀放缓为欧洲央行在今年夏天开始降息打开了大门，但地缘政治仍有可能破坏降息计划。【原文：Slower inflation has opened the door for the European Central Bank to start lowering interest rates this summer, though geopolitics could still derail such plans, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】
